headline: Garmin introduces the APK 10 Autopilot Keypad for simplified control
summary: Garmin (NYSE: GRMN), the world's most innovative and recognized marine electronics manufacturer, today announced the new APK™ 10 Autopilot Keypad designed to give mariners more precise control of their Reactor™ 40 autopilot. The keypad features an LED-encircled rotary knob that allows for specific heading control, along with two autopilot buttons – engage and standby – and two multipurpose buttons that can be customized to the vessel.
